product_overview: A Flutter-based e-commerce shopping app offering product browsing, cart management, and checkout functionalities with a clean and intuitive Material Design interface.
core_goals: Enable users to browse and search products efficiently by category and search filters.
Provide seamless shopping cart management including add/remove items and quantity adjustments.
Facilitate a smooth checkout process with delivery and payment simulation.
Ensure responsive and intuitive navigation via bottom tabs for easy access to home, cart, and menu screens.
Maintain consistent UI and UX through theme management and state synchronization.
key_features: Product Management: Display product listings with category filtering and detailed views.
Shopping Cart: Add, remove, and update quantities of products with real-time total calculation.
Checkout System: Process orders by collecting delivery information and simulating payment.
Home Screen: Interactive product grid with search bar and category chips for filtering.
Navigation System: Bottom navigation bar for switching between Home, Cart, and Menu sections.
Theme Management: Custom app theme ensuring consistent styling across all screens.
State Management: Provider pattern implementation for efficient state handling of products and cart.
user_flow_summary: User launches app and lands on the Home Screen displaying a grid of products.
User utilizes search bar or category chips to filter available products.
Selecting a product navigates the user to the Product Detail Screen with item specifics.
User adds desired product quantities to the shopping cart.
User navigates to the Cart Screen via bottom navigation to review and adjust cart items.
User proceeds to Checkout Screen to enter delivery details and complete simulated payment.
Post-checkout, user receives confirmation and may continue shopping or exit the app.
validation_criteria: Product listings correctly filter and display based on category and search input.
Shopping cart accurately reflects added items, quantity changes, and total price updates.
Checkout successfully collects user input and simulates payment without errors.
Navigation between Home, Cart, and Menu screens is smooth and functions correctly.
UI elements adhere to the custom theme and maintain consistency across devices.
State updates propagate properly across product and cart providers ensuring data integrity.
